headline: Could Citizens Financial’s Steady Preferred Dividends Reveal More About Its Capital Strength Story? (CFG)
summary: Citizens Financial Group recently declared quarterly cash dividends on six series of its preferred stock, payable in January 2026 to shareholders of record as of December 22, 2025. These dividend announcements highlight the company's ongoing capital strength and commitment to providing returns to its preferred shareholders alongside recent operational outperformance. We'll now explore how Citizens Financial Group's ongoing dividend payments further support its investment narrative centered...
